City Council
============

Meetings
--------

* 3 pm (work session), 6 pm
* 2nd and 4th Tuesday of every month
* City Hall  
  411 W. 8th Street  
  City Council Chambers - 5th Floor  
  Odessa, TX 79761

Contact Us
----------

Mailing Address:  
P.O. Box 4398  
Odessa, Texas 79760  
  
Physical Address:  
City Hall ¬†  
411 W. 8th Street  
Odessa, Texas 79761  
  
Phone: 432-335-3276  
Email: [citycouncil@odessa-tx.gov](mailto:citycouncil@odessa-tx.gov)

Watch Council meetings live below.

Overview
--------

The City Council is the legislative policy-making body of the City. Council members:

* Approve contracts
* Adopt regulatory ordinances and resolutions
* Approve the annual budget
* Determine the tax rate
* Provide direction to the City Manager and other Council appointees
* And provide a forum for active community participation in setting and achieving City policies, goals and objectives

### Terms

The Odessa City Council is comprised:

5 City Council members elected by districts

1 At-Large member and the Mayor

Note: City Council members serve staggered 4-year terms

| Name | Position | Term Expires |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Cal Hendrick | Mayor | November 7, 2028 |
| Craig Stoker | At-Large | November 7, 2028 |
| Eddie Mitchell | District 1 | November 7, 2028 |
| Steven P. Thompson | District 2 | November 7, 2028 |
| Gilbert Vasquez | District 3 | November 3, 2026 |
| Greg Connell | District 4 | November 3, 2026 |
| Chris Hanie | District 5 | November 3, 2026 |
